tr_welcomeApp: Akwaaba wɔ Organized – Wo asafoɔ animuonyam dwuma kɔbɔ
tr_descApp: Ao, nni app bɛn a ebinan wɔ Jehovah's Witnesses asafoɔ ase. Ma wo mma sɛ wo de saa ɛbɛyɛ. Sɛ wo pɛ asafoɔ no nyinaa bɔne no, yɛn rekɔ kyɛfa omanfoɔ so hwɛ wɔn nkontompo. Yɛ aware sɛ wɔbɛkɔ apps a wɔdi wɔn ho nsɔ nea ɛyɛ a, wɔde atumi nso di wo ho sɛ ɛbɛyɛ.
tr_appPWA: Organized yɛ PWA app. Aboa bɛn na ɛfiri?
tr_appPWADesc:
Wɔbɔ PWA app no asɛm, Organized betumi afa wɔ wo borɔde so. Wɔde atumi nkyerɛ ɔpɛre ne nsisim, enti ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ dektop ne smartphone no.

Wɔretumi asesa ase wɔ wo ahyɛaseɛ mu, na lɛ, sɛ wɔbɛdi wo ho bɔɔ offline, ɛbɛyɛ a ɛyɛ sɛ wobu di wo din akyerɛ wɔ bere a wonni internet connection no.
tr_appSecure: Sɛ nea ɛbɛyɛ no bɛyɛ dwuma, wo nkuto biyɛ wɔ Organized no mu?
tr_appSecureDesc:
Yɛbɔ asɛm sɛnea a yɛwɔ ne maa wo nkuto bi dwuma. Sɛnea a ɛwɔ yɛ no so, yɛhyɛ Organized so na yɛatu ase no.

Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn Organized bɔ abɔdin, wo nkuto no yɛ wo asafoɔ no apɛden. Yɛrekɔ wo ahyɛaseɛ mu saa a wɔbɛtumi ntumi nnidi no no. Yɛde mpae ase wɔ server mu na yɛde bɔ nkuto bi ase sɛ ɛkɛtɛkɛ.
tr_clearBrowserData: Adɛn nti sɛ wo nan so no na wɔn ndi no, wɔtoo Organized data a wɔyɛɛ no mu? Yɛbɛhyɛ no sɛ wo data a wɔka no yɛɛ mu a, wɔnkɔ mmepa.
tr_appPrivacy: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, Organized bɛma wo nkuto sɛ?
tr_appPrivacyDesc:
Sɛ wobedi ahyɛ Organized app no, yɛwɔ din bi kɛse sɛnea a wɔde ma wo, na email no nso. Afei, yɛwɔ din bi ahyɛ sɛ wo device IP address ne user agent a edi wo device no nea wɔfrɛ no.

Fi wo din dodo, yɛwɔn nkuto yɛ bɔne. Yɛrenkyɛrɛ adwinifo a wobedi no biara na yɛnnyinaa mu bi bɛn na wɔbɛma no. Yɛyɛ kwan sɛ yɛbɛhyɛ Organized app no.
tr_readComplete: Me de adwuma na minni dodo no
tr_accountCreated: Wobɛtumi amma wo Organized account. Kɔkɔbɔ kasa nea wo asafoɔ animuonyam no so nea edi kan.
tr_unauthorizedRole: Wɔbɔ Asafo no bi te sɛ wo nni asomdwoe a ɛbɛyɛ dɛ no. Nyinaa tia akɔnnɔ nka wo Asafo no so kyɛ wo saa ɔdɔ a ɛfa yɛn so de sɛ wo sɔrebɔ. Sɛ wobɛyɛ ɛfa no a, fa no so sɛ wobɛhyɛ hwee mu n'ahyehyɛe adi na hyɛ nea ɛsɛ mu sɛ ɛnni. Sɛ wɔbɛyɛ ɔsoro hɔn a, wobɛtumi aka yɛn na yɛate ase fa email.
tr_oauthAccept: Sɛ wodi so, wobedi yɛn Asafoɔ no Nkontompo ne Polisi.
tr_signInDesc: Paw anaa wo pɛ sɛ wo ma ho sɛnea?
tr_emailAuthDesc: Bɔ din biara mu na yɛ pɛ sɛ ɛmma wo link a wɔreba wɔ Organized authentication no mu.
tr_emailAuthDescComplete: Wo de bɔhyɛ email no so na wo de sii app no.
tr_emailAuthSent: Check wo email inbox no. Sɛ ɛnyɛ, kɔkɔbɔ kasa so na begye link no.
tr_accountSetup: Sɛ wo pɛ Organized app no afotu wo device no mu, bɔɔ invitation code a wo mmofra asom wɔn kɔtɔ no mu.
tr_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsHeader: Wo asɛnka ne assignments no nyinaa
tr_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsDescri: Hwɛ wo adiɛ sɛwoara no nyinaa ne gye no akwankyerɛ wɔn a wɔrekɔboa wo. Gye nhoma foforo a wɔyɛ wɔn mu. Sumit akwampae boafoɔ no foforo. Akenkan foforo, atumi nni dwuma no ase, na adwuma foforo no ase na kyɛ awo report no mu.
tr_illustrationMultiPlattformHeader: Wɔwo adwuma wɔ wɔn nyinaa so
tr_illustrationMultiPlattformDescription: Fa Organized app no wɔ wɔ dektop, laptop, smartphone, na tablet a ɛwɔ wɔn atesodeɛ mu wɔ nyinaa akyiri yi a. App no bɛyɛ so online, na ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wobɛwo offline bi.
tr_illustrationMeetingSchedulesDescripti: Twe meeting plan no kɔ jw.org nhyehyɛɛ mu na akyerɛ wo nhoma no. Fako assignments no nea ɛyɛ no. Bɔ report no, a, bɔ ara no nea ɛbɛyɛ a, yɛbɛso akɔ so twewi wɔn a wɔbɛtumi nni nhyiam no mu na ɛbɛto kyɛkɔ list foforo a na wɔretu no so, na wɔkɔ so kyɛɛ wɔn mu. Yɛretumi nsɛm meeting schedules no kɔ public foforo ne midweek students, yɛbɛpɛ sɛ wɔn nkɔso assignments wɔn mu.
tr_illustrationSecretaryDescription: Twe meeting attendance record no kɔ adwumayɛ no nyinaa, sia no ne afoforo no nyinaa. Hwɛ publisher reports no na yɛbɛso akɔ so bɔ report foforo a wɔbɛtumi nkɔ so mmusu wo abrabɔ. Hu mpenpene ne sumit dwuma akwampae boafoɔ no mu.
tr_selectAccount: Sɛ wo pɛ sɛ wo de Organized no, gye sɛnea a ɛwɔ ne.
tr_accountPublisherStudent: Ɔkasafoɔ na osuani a wɔn nhyiam no
tr_wrongInvitationCode: Invitation code a wo bɛsra no koraa no pɛ sɛ obi bɛtumi asesa ase.
tr_checkInvitationCode: Please double-check the code you provided
tr_congregationCreateLabel: W'asafoɔ no yɛe nea Organized no mu kan?
tr_incompleteCongregationInfo: Adooso, san bɔ saa nsɛm yi ase a, bɔɔ saa ase no.
tr_encryptionCodeSetupDesc: Bɔɔ encryption code a wɔrehyɛ no.
tr_encryptionCodeLostDesc: Bɔɔ wo asafoɔ no encryption code a wɔto no mu.
tr_encryptionCodeNotice: Kae sɛ wobɛma no so nea wopɛ sɛ woyɛɛ mu. Sɛ wobɛma no so, afei de wobɛma no so no mu biara.
tr_encryptionCodeInvalid: The encryption code you provided is incorrect
tr_emailNotSupported: Sorry, this email is invalid or not supported
